photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR
element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running
Alias: 30e5ea00
Share by:

About
navigation placeholders
Hot Off De Grill
About Us.
-
Our History
Hot Off De Grill.
The concept for Hot Off De Grill was formulated from our need to share the world renowned flavor and rich culture of Jamaica’s native cooking process known as Jerk. It was created as an invitation for my extended human family to sample our identifiably unique taste and aroma which will give everyone “the reason to love jerk”. Our curated homemade blend of fresh herbs and spices, marinates naturally reared chicken and pork that results in our delicious, fire-licked goodness & shows why Hot Off De Grill is “The Jerk Spot For Everyone”.
ORDER ONLINE
Button
-
Learn More
How We Got Started.
Just after the cases of the corona virus began to decrease during the COVID pandemic, the opportunity presented itself to launch a new jerk concept in west Pembroke Pines. At the core, Hot Off De Grill is a “Jerk Spot” that sells Jamaican food. We put great importance on the integrity of choosing the best products and ingredients, with special attention to the authentic flavors and a modernized process. The result is a fast casual Jamaican concept that is making its mark in the Caribbean food scene.
-
